sectionTitle: Why do people praise about Prime Express, INC?

testimonials.subject: The Prime Express, INC team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: There are thousands of transportation companies in the US. But there's nothing like Prime Express, their popularity and reputation are just evident.
testimonials.name: Bill Clark

testimonials.subject: The Prime Express, INC team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: When we're facing short lead times, this company is first to call!
testimonials.name: Amanda Higgins

testimonials.subject: The Prime Express, INC team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: Whether it's a drop or a pick-up they've proven to be a strategic solutions-oriented partner capable of pulling off a bunch of diffrent truckload services.
testimonials.name: Jeff Palmer

testimonials.subject: The Prime Express, INC team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: I've been working with over 15 trucking companies but Prime Express is one of the most impressive to me.
testimonials.name: Tommy Stark
